entities.name: the wand
entities.description: The wand is described as an object that can withdraw silvery strands of thought.

entities.name: his temple
entities.description: His temple is the location where he raises his wand.

entities.name: the basin
entities.description: The basin is an object where he deposits the silvery strands of thought.

entities.name: he
entities.description: He is a person performing the action of withdrawing and depositing the strands of thought.

relationships.description: The wand is at his temple, where he raises it.
He uses the wand to withdraw strands of thought.
He deposits the silvery strands in the basin.
The wand is used with the basin to deposit the strands of thought.
